borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Deconversion of the existing property from 3no. self-contained flats into a single family dwellinghouse; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side of existing back addition; demolition of the external two storey store, to the rear elevation at ground and first floor level; installation of new enlarged sliding doors following the removal of existing, to the rear elevation at ground floor level; alterations to the front elevation at ground floor level to include, removal of existing second step to form a step free access to the main front entrance; lowering the rear garden and main building floor level; further excavation of part of the front garden, and excavation of part of the rear garden to form a rear lightwell with a walk on glass rooflight, in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement; alterations within the front lightwell to include, installation of new French doors with side panels following the removal of existing windows to the front elevation, alterations to the wall and existing door to the side elevation, and enlargement of the existing external staircase.
